name: Happy Little Trees
description:
Happy Little Trees

This is a submission to the Geta Game Jam 10
Challenge yourself to make a game in three days!
Theme: It never ends

The original idea was to create an ecosystem of trees and animals,  but it ended up as a weird version of a shooter game.

You collect CO2 to make trees grow faster.

You could play this game to practice your mouse accuracy for FPS games or as a warmup.

I didn't test the builds for windows and mac. Please let me know if they don't work.
This is the first game i made with the  godot engine: https://godotengine.org/
